alert.note: Alert for Kossuth; Winnebago (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 14 at 2:36PM CST until November 14 at 6:00PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: .Accumulating snowfall is expected across far northern Iowa today as a system passes gradually through the region. Some light freezing drizzle may also occur as the snow diminishes this afternoon. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, snow will be ending this afternoon. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations on Tuesday will be 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Parts of north central Iowa. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest travel conditions, check the Iowa 511 app, www.511ia.org, or dial 511.
